onCountBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Report101Controller
This method retrieves the type and month from the comboboxes and counts the number of the chosen type of appointment in the chosen month.
onDeleteApptBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ApptSummaryController
This method displays a confirmation message and deletes the selected appointment from the database.
onDeleteCustomerBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainScreenController
This method deletes the selected customer from the database.

This method launches the Edit Appointment screen and passes the selected appointment.

This method launches the Edit Customer screen and passes the selected customer.

This method exits the application.
